definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: The cistern empties in five minutes.
I let myself cry all the tears I denied.
sentences.chinese: 我盡情哭泣，流乾了一直以來盡力忍着的淚水。
爲什麼你的眼淚流乾了？

sentences.english: And it's draining all of me, oh, they find it hard to believe.
sentences.chinese: 而我的血完全流乾，哦，他們很難相信這一點。

definition: to wail at a funeral/formal wailing while offering sacrifice to the departed
to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
lit. liver and guts cut to pieces (idiom)/fig. grief-stricken
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
seriously ill and about to die
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
to be unable to move a single step
